body.p:
Newport Kentucky
Nov 8. 1865
To His Excellency
Thomas E. Bramlette
Gov of Kentucky
Dr Sir,

It is most respectfully requested by me that steps may be promptly taken by your Excellency to arrest and bring to this city for trial one Claudius Tift charged in the enclosed affidavit with felony. Said Lift fled the state and went to La Crosse Wisconsin after committing the offense -- The case is a clear one agst him

Most respectfully
Oliver W. Root
County atty,
